name: Foam Armageddon
description:
Foam Armageddon is a fast-paced arena shooter made for the "E1M1 Magazine Jam #2 - Retro FPS Jam!"

Defeat hordes of other kids!

Navigate colorful and original maps!

Eat candy to keep your health and blood sugar high!

Contains:

  • 4 Arenas
  • 4 different enemy types based on common clichés
  • 5 Weapons.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Controls:

WASD / ZQSD - Move

Mouse left - Shoot

Mouse right - Alt fire

R - Reload

1,2,3,4,5 or Mousewheel - Change weapon

Credits:

Bacon Oreos;  All weapon models  

Irrational Machines:  Music

Gabriel Lopez "Yuplis":  2D Art and "Floor is balls!" map

Schmoguesoft: Programming, modelling, concept leveldesign and animations
